text: Hianagi 7ni zagegna Ra Anumzana tamagri Anumzamofo manigsa hu knagita, ana zagegnarera eri'zana e'origosaze. Kagrane, neka'ane, mofaka'ane, ve eri'za vaheka'ane, a' eri'za vaheka'ane, bulimakao afuka'ane, donki afuka'ane, ruga'a afuzagaka'ane, rurega vahe'ma tamagrane enemaniza vahe'enena eri'zana e'oriho. Hagi kazokazo eri'za vahetamia zamatrenke'za ana knarera eri'zana e'ori tamagrama hanazaza hu'za manigasa hiho.
